name: DimeADozen.AI / Launchmates.AI
title: Founder
description: An LLM based business validator and launchpad for startups. We help you validate your idea, build your MVP, and launch your business.
notes: Generated over 40,000 business reports for small business owners and agencies
Over 1,100 sales at an average of $62 per sale
Worked with influencers, growth marketers, and agencies to expand our marketing footprint in novel ways
Launched MVP in 4 days

name: Game Creators Club
title: Founder
description: The Ultimate STEM playground for young gamers to learn, create, and share their own video games. A virtual after-school program that teaches kids how to design, code, and publish their own games.
notes: Over 3,000 new young coders have learned game development
More than 5,000 games created and published by students
Cross-platform support for Android tablets, iPads, and web browsers
Comprehensive learning platform with tutorials, courses, and challenges
Safe, moderated community for kids ages 8-18 to learn and share
Full drag-and-drop and coding environments for all skill levels
Over 2,000 hours of classes taught to young developers

name: Clever Health
title: CTO / Co-Founder
description: A full-service virtual care (telemedicine) and prescription pricing platform available to over 100,000 members
notes: Architected and maintained multiple React Native Android/iOS app written in strict TypeScript
Architected and maintained a fully stateless RESTful API using Serverless, NodeJS, and strict TypeScript, hosted on AWS API Gateway
Worked closely with the CEO and executive team to convert business rules into real executable logic
Managed team of engineers and worked with business leaders to schedule features and releases
Integrated with several third-party APIs for things such as prescription lookup, drug pricing, video conferencing, doctor consultations, and Twilio IVR
Built from scratch with React, React-native, Typescript, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, AWS, Serverless

name: DoubleDates
title: Founder
description: A Social Event Matchmaker built specifically for couples
notes: Designed business model from the ground up to best suit customer needs
Worked closely with potential customers to design UX journeys and personas
Architected and maintained a React Native Android/iOS app written in strict TypeScript
Architected and maintained a fully stateless RESTful API using Serverless, NodeJS, and strict TypeScript, hosted on AWS API Gateway
Designed custom modern UI/UX

name: Styr Labs
title: Chief Technology Officer / Co-Founder
description: Personal nutrition wellness app used by tens of thousands
notes: Built the development team from a single engineer to a stable team of 10 in under 6 months
Outlined and built architecture for a brand-new backend system, database, web portal, and mobile applications, as well as payment processing and order fulfillment
Pioneered the use of TypeScript, React Native, and Serverless
Worked closely with CEO to devise and develop features that would affect our business
Procured and managed relationships with 3rd party vendors
Oversaw the creation and development of 7 mobile applications, 4 web portals, and countless 3rd party integrations, used by tens of thousands of paying customers each day
Integrated a custom hardware stack to support the seamless communication with multiple proprietary Bluetooth devices
Devised process for backend and application deploys to allow consistent and continuous deploys

name: HealthiestYou
title: VP, Engineering
description: Telemedicine app built for users, sold through insurance brokers with over 20,000 enrolled agents
notes: Led a team of 6 frontend and backend developers
Oversaw transition to telephony to WebRTC-based doctor video network; resulted in 100,000+ annual membership boost and 12 million dollar annual revenue increase
Parallelized member feed processes utilizing AWS queueing and server caching system to meet the increasing demand
Rebuilt backend API layer and purpose-built MongoDB ORM into stable, structured stack; increasing junior .NET developer productivity and onboarding
Released Ionic-based Android/iOS application; utilized by 100,000+ users daily
Architected framework for internal and external use web portals; ensured integration capability with 20+ third party networks
Sold to Teledoc for $180 Million, the biggest acquisition by them at that time
